titleStmt.title: A proclamation for preseruation of vvoods.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dates are given according to Lady Day dating; imprint from colophon.
Dated at end: Royston the xiiij. day of February, in the sixt yeere of our reigne ...
Forbidding the selling of timber trees on royal lands and elsewhere. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
